019
020import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
021import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
022
023import java.util.Collection;
024import java.util.Optional;
025
026/**
027 * Datable
028 *
029 * @param <O> The object that is going to be stored/loaded from the database.
030 *
031 * @author creatorfromhell
032 * @since 0.1.2.0
033 */
034public interface Datable<O> {
035
036  /**
037   * The class that is represented by the O parameter.
038   *
039   * @return The class that represents the parameter.
040   */
041  Class<? extends O> clazz();
042
043  /**
044   * USed to purge the objects of this datable.
045   *
046   * @param connector The storage connector to use for this transaction.
047   */
048  void purge(StorageConnector<?> connector);
049
050  /**
051   * Used to store this object.
052   *
053   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
054   * @param object     The object to be stored.
055   * @param identifier An optional identifier for loading this object. Note: some Datables may
056   *                   require this identifier.
057   */
058  void store(StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull O object, @Nullable String identifier);
059
060  /**
061   * Used to store all objects of this type.
062   *
063   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
064   * @param identifier The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier,
065   *                   otherwise this will be null.
066   */
067  void storeAll(StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable String identifier);
068
069  /**
070   * Used to load this object.
071   *
072   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
073   * @param identifier The identifier used to identify the object to load.
074   *
075   * @return The object to load.
076   */
077  Optional<O> load(StorageConnector<?> connector, @NotNull final String identifier);
078
079  /**
080   * Used to load all objects of this type.
081   *
082   * @param connector  The storage connector to use for this transaction.
083   * @param identifier The identifier used to load objects, if they relate to a specific identifier,
084   *                   otherwise this will be null.
085   *
086   * @return A collection containing the objects loaded.
087   */
088  Collection<O> loadAll(StorageConnector<?> connector, @Nullable final String identifier);
089}
